high_level_goal: Create new /quote page with instant estimate calculator and lead capture

inputs.description: Build a dead-simple instant quote page for event hosts/CEOs/politicians. Map-based perimeter drawing, coverage inputs, add-ons, and lead capture. Match existing site style.

subtasks.title: Create info/quote.html page
subtasks.details: Create new page matching site style. H1: 'Get an instant estimate'. Subhead: 'Draw your venue perimeter, pick coverage hours, and see teams + pricing in seconds.'

subtasks.title: Step 1: Map + Perimeter Draw
subtasks.details: Use Mapbox GL JS for map. Add address search box. Add polygon drawing tool. Compute area (acres) and perimeter (feet) using turf.js. Display chips showing area/perimeter. Store polygon as GeoJSON. If no Mapbox key, degrade gracefully with manual input fields for area.

subtasks.title: Step 2: Coverage Inputs
subtasks.details: Hours slider: 4-16 (default 8). Risk select: Standard / Elevated / High-profile. Site complexity toggles: Entrances (1 / 2-3 / 4+), Multi-lot parking (yes/no), Rooftops (none / some / many).

subtasks.title: Step 3: Add-ons (checkbox cards)
subtasks.details: Cinematic recap reel: +$1,500. Full content capture (raw clips): +$2,500. Site mapping + zone overlay: +$1,000. Expedited Safety Receipt (same night): +$1,000. LiDAR/3D scan: label as 'Advanced site scan (quoted)' - no price.

subtasks.title: Step 4: Calculator logic
subtasks.details: Implement in config object: area_factor = area_acres / 15, perimeter_factor = perimeter_ft / 5000, complexity = 1 + 0.25*risk + 0.2*entrances + 0.2*multi_lot + 0.15*rooftops, load = (area_factor + perimeter_factor) * complexity, teams = max(1, ceil(load)). Pricing: total = teams * 7500 + max(0, hours-8) * 750 * teams + addons_total. Update instantly on change.

subtasks.title: Step 5: Estimate Output Display
subtasks.details: Show card with: 'Estimated teams required: N', 'Estimated price: $X,XXX'. Breakdown: Base package ($7,500 × N teams), Extra hours (if >8), Add-ons total. What's included bullets: 2-3 drones per team, Manual operations + AI-assisted alerting, Real-time handoff to security lead, Next-day Safety Receipt, Part 107 compliant. ALWAYS show disclaimer: 'Estimate only. Final quote after confirmation call/site walk and airspace check.'

subtasks.title: Step 6: Lead capture form
subtasks.details: Fields: Name, email, phone, Organization, Event date/time, Notes. Buttons: Primary 'Request final quote', Secondary 'Book a 10-min confirmation call'. Form should include estimate summary in submission.

subtasks.title: Create config file
subtasks.details: Create a quote-config.js or inline config object with all pricing constants for easy tuning: BASE_PER_TEAM, EXTRA_HOUR_RATE, AREA_DIVISOR, PERIMETER_DIVISOR, RISK_MULTIPLIER, etc.

deliverables: New info/quote.html page with full calculator
Calculator logic with turf.js for geometry

notes_from_legate: This is the key conversion page. Make it dead-simple for executives who don't want to read jargon. The map/draw feature is the wow factor - but have a fallback if Mapbox doesn't load. Teams should NEVER be 0. Always show the disclaimer. Match the existing site style (off-white background, navy text, gold accents, purple gradient buttons). NO BVLOS claims anywhere.
